description.value: You favor weapons that you can use with quick, darting slashes like a catâ€™s claws. You are trained with the @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.LGgvev6AV0So8tP9]{Hatchet}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.zSAoyzcf3nSeZCiF]{Kama}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.TDrO7Xdyn7juFy3c]{Kukri}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.grmaV4GdoGD7sKbn]{Scimitar}, and @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.ynnBwzkzsR6B73iO]{Sickle}. In addition, you gain access to kama, kukris, and all uncommon catfolk weapons. For you, martial catfolk weapons are simple weapons and advanced catfolk weapons are martial weapons.
